log-description-legallogin: This is a log of accepted Legal Login policies and answered questions.
legallogin-desc: This extension requires acceptance of legal policies and correct answer on test questions during account creation and login
legallogin-policy-checkbox-label: I have read and accept the $1
legallogin-policy-full-page-view: Click here to read in full-page view
legallogin-extra-fields-required-for-acc: Legal Login extra fields required for account creation
legallogin-policy-must-be-read: You must read the '$1' policy before accepting
legallogin-policy-must-be-accepted: For requested operation you must accept the '$1' policy
legallogin-incorrect-answer-on-question: Your answer on the question '$1' is incorrect
legallogin-js-should-be-enabled: Site requires JavaScript to be enabled
legallogin-policies-must-be-accepted: You should accept Legal Login policies
logentry-legallogin-accept: {{GENDER:$2|User}} $1 accepted {{PLURAL:$4|policy|policies}} $5 and answered {{PLURAL:$6|question|questions}} $7. {{GENDER:$2|User}} has logged in $8 {{PLURAL:$8|time|times}} since last acceptance, last login was $9. $10.
logentry-legallogin-login: {{GENDER:$2|User}} $1 logged in $5 {{PLURAL:$5|time|times}} since last acceptance, at $6 acceptance was required: $7. $4. $8.
right-legallogin-view-log: View the accepted Legal Login policies
action-legallogin-view-log: view the accepted Legal Login policies
right-legallogin-bypass: Bypass the check for groups allowed to bypass
action-legallogin-bypass: bypass the check for groups allowed to bypass
